General.Name: Haibo Heavy Engineering Science and Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Haibo Heavy Engineering Science and Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and installation of steel bridge structures in China. It provides bridge steel structure process design, steel beam production, segment transportation, bridge location installation, and bridge steel structure maintenance services. The company constructs suspension, steel arch, cable-stayed, urban elevated, and municipal landscape bridges, as well as BRT platforms. Haibo Heavy Engineering Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Wuhan, China.
General.Address: No. 6, Huangjinqiao Industrial Park, Wuhan, China, 430207
